2.Pros: I would only recommend this job to full time students that need to make money on the side. Free lunch...

7.Pros: Free Meals on half break, able to have flexabile hours only if you put it in employee Availablity book. Get to work with customers to help them learn what better deals there are to help them save money.
7.Cons: put in back drive through all the time and not trained in other areas in the store. as well as having to listen to people complain about there problems and put others down which is causing alot of tention in the work invirament, coworkers doughting each others possions and underminding there work that is being performed without discussing it with them personally..and another thing listening to faul language is not buisness ediquate and verry unatractive.. You dont get 6 months revew as you were told you would.

8.Pros: Learned a lot about Management and scheduling. It was hard with the constant turn over to maintain customer service
8.Cons: it's a Fast Food Place. You need to be aware of the realities, but franchisers are the ones who decide on the environment. So the better the franchise the better the environment for staff

9.Pros: Work was as I expected, Decent colleagues, Good Company Culture, Some Flexibility, Kind Managers, and I had a good experience in general.
9.Cons: I believe that my salary was low for my work, and I would appreciate better benefits than those that I received.
